channel.title: Callbacks on Andrew Bancroft

item.title: Fundamentals of Callbacks for Swift Developers
item.description: Updated on October 12, 2016 – Swift 3.0 Callbacks: What are they? How do they work? What are they used for in practice? My goal in this article is to provide answers to these questions so that you have a foundational understanding of this common programming pattern in iOS development. Jump to… What are callbacks? Learn by example: Designing an API for callbacks “Hook-in” options
